text:
@capt_amarinder #AskCaptain  sir please bring back lockdown in main districts of Punjab where cases are at peak.
Today 78 new cases in jalandhar were reported from the previous infected one.
People aren't safe and asymptomatic patients are roaming and spreading the virus.
#covid19
